long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sort By Reviews for Amazon is a highly useful Chrome extension designed to enhance your shopping experience on Amazon. With a simple click, it allows you to sort reviews effectively, enabling you to easily access the most helpful feedback for making informed purchasing decisions. Additionally, this extension provides quick access to product prices, saving you both time and money.

Key Features:

Review Sorting: Easily sort Amazon product reviews by rating and relevance to find the most helpful feedback quickly.

Upcoming Price Comparison Feature: Future updates will include a 'one-click' price comparison feature for seamless price checks across products.

Intuitive Interface: Enjoy an easy-to-use interface that simplifies navigating and using the extension.

Fast and Reliable Performance: Experience swift and dependable performance when sorting reviews and accessing product information.

Support for Multiple Amazon Regions: Compatible with multiple Amazon regions, ensuring accessibility and functionality across different locales.

How to Use 

1: Install the Extension 

Type in chrome web store and search for Sort By Reviews for Amazon extension and install it. 

2: Visit Amazon 

The first activity involved is to go to the homepage of Amazon and enter a search query. 

3. Click the Extension Icon 

The icon is located near the extension’s logo on the far right of the Chrome toolbar,  

To do this, one should click on the Sort By Reviews extension icon located in the browser toolbar. 

4: Sort and Compare 

It is a flash animation that presents a series of objects that need to be sorted into categories, followed by another set of objects that need to be compared in some way. 

Select your sorting criteria of choice and get to view the sorted results for reviews and price comparison instantly without delay. 

Who has the benefit? 

This extension is ideal for Amazon users, who are keen on buying from Amazon and who are interested in quality reviews to make the right decisions. Regardless of the role that you play in the purchase process – a seeker of a good deal, an IT-savvy consumer, or any other, this extension will greatly improve your purchasing journey. 

  

Why is it Useful? 

As you can see, this extension has the option to sort the reviews of the product as well as to compare the prices of the same product by using only a single click. It means that you can easily find the most useful and appropriate reviews section as well as the best prices for the items you want to buy, which will make this process faster and more enjoyable for you. 
 

FAQs 

1. This extension is free, isn’t it?  

Originally, it was pertinent to make it clear to the users that Sort By Reviews for Amazon is a free application. 

2. Is it compatible with all the websites related to Amazon?  

Yes, it supports multiple Amazon regions like Amazon.com, Amazon. co.uk, Amazon.de, and more. 

3. How do I update the extension?  

Updates are automatic. Chrome will update the extension when a new version is released. 

4. Can I use it on mobile devices?  

No, currently the extension is only available for desktop use on Chrome. 

5. Is my data safe with this extension?  

Yes, the extension does not collect any personal data or track your browsing activity. Your privacy is our priority.
